q: That's just Philly. When I play bad, they boo." Matt Geiger missed 10 of 14 shots, and kept losing rebounds to the Raptors. When rookie Todd MacCullough replaced him, the crowd cheered. The crowd getting on Matt Geiger , and then at the end of the game he ended up being one of the heroes, said Allen Iverson , who scored 37 points. "It's tough.
